lead_paragraph: United States District Court Judge Jed S. Rakoff allowed the suit against Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz to go forward, but reduced how much money could be recovered for victims of the Madoff scheme.
snippet: United States District Court Judge Jed S. Rakoff allowed the suit against Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz to go forward, but reduced how much money could be recovered for victims of the Madoff scheme.
